network_overview: A single SIGTRAN link between 10.47.82.11 and 10.1.244.8 carrying only low-rate M3UA/SCTP signaling (11 chunks in 21 s). No user-plane, Diameter, or voice traffic is present in this capture.

observations.finding: SCTP heartbeat-only pattern: 11 chunks over 21 s with no M3UA ERROR or ABORT chunks
observations.evidence: Top-flow: 0.52 pkt/s, 1636 bytes, no expert warnings

inconclusive_aspects.reason: No SIP, RTP, or IMS protocols observed
inconclusive_aspects.additional_capture_needed: Capture on P-CSCF or SBC interfaces to observe SIP INVITE/183/200 and RTP
Capture on S1-U/S5-U to verify GTP tunnels for any data session
Capture on MME-HSS or PCRF links to inspect Diameter answer codes

recommendations.action: Collect simultaneous captures on SIP and GTP-U interfaces to correlate with this SIGTRAN link
recommendations.rationale: Current trace shows only idle M3UA heartbeats; voice or data issues cannot be diagnosed without SIP/RTP/GTP evidence

session_analysis.signaling_health: SIGTRAN link healthy: SCTP heartbeats exchanged every ~2 s with no retransmissions or errors observed
session_analysis.user_plane_health: Not observable at this capture point
session_analysis.voice_quality: Not observable at this capture point
session_analysis.cross_plane_correlation: No user-plane or voice protocols present to correlate
